description.english: Reveal the entire map of Canaan
description.german: Decke die gesamte Karte von Canaan auf
description.french: Révélez entièrement la carte de Canaan
description.spanish: Desvela todo el mapa de Canaan.
description.schinese: 揭示迦南的完整地图
description.tchinese: 揭露迦南的完整地圖
description.japanese: カナン全土の地図を明らかにする
description.brazilian: Revele todo o mapa de Canaan.

description.english: Acquire all Accessories
description.french: Faites l'acquisition de tous les accessoires
description.spanish: Hazte con todos los accesorios.
description.schinese: 获得所有配件
description.tchinese: 獲得所有的配件
description.japanese: すべてのアクセサリーを手に入れる
description.brazilian: Adquira todos os acessórios.

description.english: Complete all Bounties from the Bounty Board
description.german: Schließe alle Kopfgeldjagden der Kopfgeldtafel ab
description.french: Terminez toutes les traques proposées par le menu des Primes
description.spanish: Completa todas las recompensas del panel de recompensas.
description.schinese: 完成赏金布告板上的所有赏金任务
description.tchinese: 完整賞金板的所有賞金挑戰
description.japanese: 依頼ボードの任務をすべてクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua todas as caçadas do quadro de caçadas.

description.english: Find all lost Corgis and return to Finn in Irkalla
description.german: Finde alle verschollenen Corgis und kehre zu Finn in Irkalla zurück
description.french: Trouvez tous les corgis perdus et allez voir Finn à Irkalla
description.spanish: Encuentra a todos los corgis perdidos y ve a Irkalla a devolvérselos a Finn.
description.schinese: 找到所有丢失的柯基犬并返回伊卡拉的芬恩处
description.tchinese: 找到所有走失的柯基犬，並送為位於伊卡拉的芬恩身邊
description.japanese: 迷子のコーギーをすべてみつけて、イルカラにいるフィンの元に返す
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os corgis perdidos e devolva-os ao Finn, em Irkalla.

description.english: Complete all Character Quests
description.french: Terminez toutes les quêtes de personnage
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de personaje.
description.schinese: 完成所有角色任务
description.tchinese: 完成所有的角色任務
description.japanese: すべてのキャラクタークエストをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua todas as missões dos personagens.

description.english: Activate all Tethers
description.french: Activez tous les Tethers
description.spanish: Activa todos los Vínculos.
description.schinese: 激活所有结界
description.tchinese: 啟動所有的連繫
description.japanese: すべてのテザーを起動する
description.brazilian: Ative todos os Ductos.

description.english: Acquire your first Accessory
description.french: Faites l'acquisition de votre premier accessoire
description.spanish: Consigue tu primer accesorio.
description.schinese: 获得首个配件
description.tchinese: 獲得第一個配件
description.japanese: はじめてアクセサリーを手に入れる
description.brazilian: Adquira seu primeiro acessório.

description.english: Activate your first Tether
description.french: Activez votre premier Tether
description.spanish: Activa tu primer Vínculo.
description.schinese: 激活首个结界
description.tchinese: 啟動第一次連繫
description.japanese: はじめてテザーを起動する
description.brazilian: Ative seu primeiro Ducto.

description.english: Find half of the lost Corgis
description.german: Finde die Hälfte der verschollenen Corgis
description.french: Trouvez la moitié des corgis perdus
description.spanish: Encuentra a la mitad de los corgis perdidos.
description.schinese: 找到一半丢失的柯基犬
description.tchinese: 找回半數走失的柯基犬
description.japanese: 迷子のコーギーを半数みつける
description.brazilian: Encontre metade dos corgis perdidos.

description.english: Hold 100,000 scrap at one time
description.french: Disposez d'un stock de 100 000 ferrailles
description.spanish: Consigue tener 10 000 piezas de chatarra a la vez.
description.schinese: 同时拥有10万个废料
description.tchinese: 一次握有 100,000 份碎片
description.japanese: 一度に10万スクラップを所持する
description.brazilian: Tenha 100.000 de sucata.

description.english: Complete all Achievements
description.french: Débloquez tous les succès
description.spanish: Completa todos los logros.
description.schinese: 完成所有成就
description.tchinese: 完成所有的成就
description.japanese: すべての実績を解除する
description.brazilian: Conclua todas as conquistas.

description.english: Craft an Accessory at Bram's Forge
description.german: Stelle ein Accessoire bei Brams Schmiede her
description.french: Fabriquez un accessoire dans la forge de Bram
description.spanish: Fabrica un accesorio en la forja de Bram.
description.schinese: 在布拉姆的铁匠铺打造一个配件
description.tchinese: 在布蘭姆的鐵匠鋪製作配件
description.japanese: ブラムの鍛冶場でアクセサリーを作る
description.brazilian: Crie um acessório na forja do Bram.

description.english: Have a drink at Vincent's Pub
description.german: Gönne dir einen Trunk in Vincents Kneipe
description.french: Buvez un verre au pub de Vincent
description.spanish: Tomaré algo en el bar de Vincent.
description.schinese: 在文森特的酒吧喝一杯
description.tchinese: 在文森的酒吧喝一杯
description.japanese: ヴィンセントの酒場で酒を飲む
description.brazilian: Tome uma bebida no bar do Vincent.

description.english: Defeat every type of enemy at least once
description.german: Besiege jeden einzelnen Gegner mindestens ein Mal
description.french: Vainquez chaque ennemi existant au moins une fois
description.spanish: Derrota a cada enemigo al menos una vez.
description.schinese: 击败每种敌人至少一次
description.tchinese: 至少擊敗每一位敵人一次
description.japanese: すべての敵を1回以上倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote todos os tipos de inimigos pelo menos uma vez.

description.english: Reach Max Level
description.french: Atteignez le niveau max
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel máximo.
description.schinese: 升至满级
description.tchinese: 達到最大等級
description.japanese: 最大レベルに達する
description.brazilian: Atinja o nível máximo.

description.english: Pet Finn the Corgi in Irkalla
description.german: Streichle den Corgi Finn in Irkalla
description.french: Caressez Finn le corgi à Irkalla
description.spanish: Acaricia al corgi Finn en Irkalla.
description.schinese: 在伊卡拉爱抚柯基犬芬恩
description.tchinese: 拍撫伊卡拉的柯基犬芬恩
description.japanese: イルカラでコーギーのフィンをかわいがる
description.brazilian: Faça um cafuné no corgi Finn em Irkalla.

description.english: Purchase an item from Faust's Lab
description.german: Kaufe einen Gegenstand aus Faustus’ Labor
description.french: Achetez un objet dans le labo de Faust
description.spanish: Compra algo del laboratorio de Fausto.
description.schinese: 从浮士德的实验室购买一件物品
description.tchinese: 從浮士德的實驗室購買一樣物品
description.japanese: ファウストの研究所からアイテムを買う
description.brazilian: Compre um item no laboratório do Fausto.

description.english: Purchase an item from Leon's Shop
description.german: Kaufe einen Gegenstand aus Leons Laden
description.french: Achetez un objet dans le magasin de Léon
description.spanish: Compra algo de la tienda de León.
description.schinese: 从里昂的商店购买一件物品
description.tchinese: 從里昂的商店購買一樣物品
description.japanese: レオンの店からアイテムを買う
description.brazilian: Compre um item na loja do Leon.

displayName.japanese: クロックワーク・アイ

description.english: Defeat Cassandra, The Clockwork Eye, on the Monorail
description.german: Besiege Cassandra, das Räderwerk-Auge, auf der Einschienenbahn
description.french: Vainquez Cassandra, l’Œil d’Horlogerie sur le monorail
description.spanish: Derrota a Cassandra, el Ojo Mecánico, en el monorraíl.
description.schinese: 在单轨列车上击败发条魔偶之眼卡桑德拉
description.tchinese: 擊敗單軌鐵路上的發條之眼卡珊卓
description.japanese: モノレールでクロックワーク・アイのカサンドラを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote a Cassandra, a Íris Mecânica, no monotrilho.

description.english: Defeat Balthazar, The Chrome Knight
description.french: Vainquez Balthazar, le Chevalier de Chrome
description.spanish: Derrota a Baltasar, el Caballero de Cromo.
description.schinese: 击败铬金骑士巴尔萨泽
description.tchinese: 擊敗鉻黃騎士巴薩扎
description.japanese: クロム・ナイトのバルタザールを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Baltazar, o Cavaleiro do Crômio.

description.english: Complete all Main Quests
description.french: Terminez toutes les quêtes principales
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones principales.
description.schinese: 完成所有主线任务
description.tchinese: 完成所有的主要任務
description.japanese: すべてのメインクエストをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua todas as missões principais.

description.english: Defeat the Einherjar Berserker in the Black Market
description.german: Besiege den Einherjar-Berserker auf dem Schwarzmarkt
description.french: Vainquez le Berserker Einherjar au Marché Noir
description.spanish: Derrota al berserker Einherjar en el mercado negro.
description.schinese: 在黑市里击败艾因赫杰狂战士
description.tchinese: 擊敗黑市的恩赫里亞狂戰士
description.japanese: ブラックマーケットで狂戦士エインヘリヤルを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Einherjar Enfurecido no mercado clandestino.

description.english: Escape from the rising Molten Steel in Fornax
description.german: Entkomme der Flut geschmolzenen Stahls in Fornax
description.french: Échappez à l'Acier Fondu qui s'élève à Fornax
description.spanish: Huye del acero fundido creciente en Fornax.
description.schinese: 逃离天炉不断上升的钢水
description.tchinese: 逃離福納克斯的上升熔融鋼鐵
description.japanese: フォーナックスでせり上がる溶鋼から逃げのびる
description.brazilian: Fuja da inundação de aço liquefeito na Fornax.

description.english: Defeat Faust's Brutes in R'lyeh
description.french: Vainquez les brutes de Faust à R'lyeh
description.spanish: Derrota a los brutos de Fausto en R'lyeh.
description.schinese: 在瑞尔耶击败浮士德的蛮人
description.tchinese: 擊敗瑞爾耶的浮士德暴徒
description.japanese: ルルイエでファウストの悪党を倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote os Brutamontes do Fausto em R'lyeh.

description.english: Defeat Renard in Meropis
description.french: Vainquez Renard à Meropis
description.spanish: Derrota a Renard en Meropis.
description.schinese: 在梅洛佩斯击败雷纳
description.tchinese: 擊敗梅洛比斯的雷納
description.japanese: メロピスでレナードを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Renard em Meropis.

description.english: Defeat Renard in the Outskirts
description.french: Vainquez Renard dans la Périphérie
description.spanish: Derrota a Renard en las afueras.
description.schinese: 在郊区击败雷纳
description.tchinese: 擊敗郊區的雷納
description.japanese: 郊外でレナードを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Renard na Cercania.

displayName.english: The Lady of the Broken Lance
displayName.french: La Dame de la Lance brisée
displayName.spanish: La Dama de la Lanza Rota

description.english: Defeat Eliza, The Lady of the Broken Lance
description.german: Besiege Eliza, die Lady der Gebrochenen Lanze
description.french: Vainquez Eliza, la Dame de la Lance brisée
description.spanish: Derrota a Eliza, la Dama de la Lanza Rota.
description.schinese: 击败断矛女士伊丽莎
description.tchinese: 擊敗斷矛的女士愛麗莎
description.japanese: 折れた槍の乙女エリザを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote a Eliza, a Lança Fendida.

description.english: Defeat Indra in the Scrap Sea
description.french: Vainquez Indra dans la mer de Ferraille
description.spanish: Derrota a Indra en el Mar de Chatarra.
description.schinese: 在废海击败因陀罗
description.tchinese: 擊敗廢鐵海的因陀羅
description.japanese: スクラップの海でインドラを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Indra, o Relâmpago Sarraceno, no Mar de Sucata.

displayName.brazilian: Combatente Aracnídeo de Observação e Segurança

description.english: Defeat MEGA M.E.S.S in the Vault Ruins
description.german: Besiege MEGA-M.E.S.S. in den Ruinen des Untergrunds
description.french: Vainquez la Méga A.M.C.E. dans les Coffres en ruine
description.spanish: Derrota a la mega-C.A.O.S en las ruinas de la cripta.
description.schinese: 在地穴废墟击败巨型军工电击蛛
description.tchinese: 擊敗地窖遺跡的軍事電擊蜘蛛
description.japanese: 保管庫跡地でメガM.E.S.S.を倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Mega C.A.O.S. nas ruínas da Câmara.

description.english: Defeat Raider Brute in the Scrap Sea
description.german: Besiege den Plündernden Grobian im Schrottmeer
description.french: Vainquez le Pillard brute dans la mer de Ferraille
description.spanish: Derrota al bruto atacante en el Mar de Chatarra.
description.schinese: 在废海击败掠夺者蛮人
description.tchinese: 擊敗廢鐵海的突襲者暴徒
description.japanese: スクラップの海で悪党レイダーを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o Brutamontes Agressor no Mar de Sucata.

description.english: Obtain the Air Dash Core Ability
description.french: Obtenez la capacité de base Voltige
description.spanish: Consigue la habilidad principal Propulsión aérea.
description.schinese: 获得空中冲刺核心技能
description.tchinese: 獲取空中衝刺核心技能
description.japanese: コアアビリティ「エアダッシュ」を会得する
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica primária Investida Aérea.

description.english: Aquire all Upgrades in the Gem Board
description.german: Erlange alle Verbesserungen auf dem Edelsteinbrett
description.french: Faites l'acquisition de toutes les améliorations du Tableau des gemmes
description.spanish: Consigue todas las mejoras del panel de gemas.
description.schinese: 完成宝石板中的所有升级
description.tchinese: 獲取寶石板上的所有升級
description.japanese: ジェムボードのアップグレードをすべて入手する
description.brazilian: Adquira todas as melhorias no quadro de joias.

description.english: Obtain the Charged Shot Core Ability
description.french: Obtenez la capacité de base Tir chargé
description.spanish: Consigue la habilidad principal Disparo cargado.
description.schinese: 获得充能射击核心技能
description.tchinese: 獲取蓄能之擊的核心技能
description.japanese: コアアビリティ「チャージショット」を会得する
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica primária Tiro Carregado.

description.english: Obtain the Charge Slash Core Ability
description.french: Obtenez la capacité de base Lame chargée
description.spanish: Consigue la habilidad principal Cargar tajo.
description.schinese: 获得充能刀刃核心技能
description.tchinese: 獲取蓄能斬擊的核心技能
description.japanese: コアアビリティ「チャージスラッシュ」を会得する
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica primária Talho Carregado.

description.english: Obtain the Double Jump Core Ability
description.french: Obtenez la capacité de base Double saut
description.spanish: Consigue la habilidad principal Salto doble.
description.schinese: 获得二段跳核心技能
description.tchinese: 獲取雙重跳躍的核心技能
description.japanese: コアアビリティ「ダブルジャンプ」を会得する
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica primária Pulo Duplo.

description.english: Obtain the Tesla Bullets Core Ability
description.french: Obtenez la capacité de base Balles Tesla
description.spanish: Consigue la habilidad principal Balas tesla.
description.schinese: 获得特斯拉子弹核心技能
description.tchinese: 獲取特斯拉子彈的核心技能
description.japanese: コアアビリティ「テスラバレット」を会得する
description.brazilian: Aprenda a técnica primária Projéteis de Tesla.
